query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notificationQueue` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('interview_reminder','feedback_request','candidate_response','engagement_alert','ab_test_result','system_update','general') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `actionUrl` text,
  `priority` enum('low','medium','high','urgent') DEFAULT 'medium',
  `deliveryMethod` enum('push','email','sms','push_email','push_sms','email_sms','all') NOT NULL,
  `scheduledFor` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('queued','processing','sent','failed','cancelled') DEFAULT 'queued' NOT NULL,
  `attempts` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastAttemptAt` timestamp NULL,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `notificationQueue_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  KEY `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `scheduledFor_idx` (`scheduledFor`),
  KEY `priority_idx` (`priority`)
)
command:

  `actionUrl` text,

  `scheduledFor` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('queued','processing','sent','failed','cancelled') DEFAULT 'queued' NOT NULL,
  `attempts` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastAttemptAt` timestamp NULL,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `notificationQueue_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  KEY `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `scheduledFor_idx` (`scheduledFor`),
  KEY `priority_idx` (`priority`)
)
